name: Soulless Jumping (DiasPTW)
description:
Soulless Jumping is a 2D platformer perfect for anyone looking for a challenge!
Master your skills and get ready to rage because this game isn't suited for the faint of heart.
Only the bravest and strong-willed can beat the game as well as beat the creator's records at their own game!


This game was made by me and my friends during the 2020 summer lockdown in the hope to cure our boredom, hope you guys enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed creating it!

Any sort of feedback is greatly appreciated :)
